environment.vehicle Module¶

class environment.vehicle.Vehicle(vehicle_id, types, out_dict, index_dict, edge_position, sumo)¶

Bases: object

Vehicle class representing a vehicle in the simulation.

vehicle_id¶

Unique identifier for the vehicle.

Type:

str

direction_choices¶

List of possible direction choices.

Type:

list

out_dict¶

Dictionary of outgoing edges.

Type:

dict

index_dict¶

Dictionary of edge indices.

Type:

dict

sumo¶

SUMO simulation instance.

edge_position¶

Dictionary of edge positions.

Type:

dict

__init__(vehicle_id, types, out_dict, index_dict, edge_position, sumo) → None¶

Initialize a Vehicle instance with the given parameters.

Parameters:

  • vehicle_id (str) – Unique identifier for the vehicle.

  • types (int) – Number of vehicle types.

  • out_dict (dict) – Dictionary of outgoing edges.

  • index_dict (dict) – Dictionary of edge indices.

  • edge_position (dict) – Dictionary of edge positions.

  • sumo – SUMO simulation instance.

get_lane()¶

Get the current lane of the vehicle.

Returns:

Current lane ID.

Return type:

str

get_lane_id()¶

Get the full lane ID of the vehicle.

Returns:

Full lane ID.

Return type:

str

get_out_dict()¶

Get the dictionary of possible outgoing edges from the current lane.

Returns:

Dictionary of outgoing edges.

Return type:

dict

get_road()¶

Get the current road ID of the vehicle.

Returns:

Current road ID.

Return type:

str

get_type()¶

Get the type of the vehicle.

Returns:

Vehicle type.

Return type:

str

location()¶

Get the current location of the vehicle.

Returns:

Current (x, y) position of the vehicle.

Return type:

list

pickup()¶

Dispatch the vehicle to pick up a passenger.

random_relocate()¶

Relocate the vehicle to a random lane.

set_destination(action, destination_edge)¶

Set the destination edge for the vehicle.

Parameters:

  • action (str) – Chosen action.

  • destination_edge (str) – Destination edge ID.

Returns:

Target lane ID.

Return type:

str

teleport(dest)¶

Teleport the vehicle to the destination edge.

Parameters:

dest (str) – Destination edge ID.
